message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it can have on your operations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out.
